content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Baihu Li. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month for the apartment. What do you think?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. I appreciate your willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. However, as the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to see if there is any room for negotiation. May I ask if you are willing to consider a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate. What do you have in mind?

Please note that I am a student and I am very responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I also want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

Please also note that I do not want to talk about utilities or anything else, only the rental price.

I would greatly appreciate your help in finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Baihu Li

P.S. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Baihu Li. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to propose a rental price of 1100 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. I understand that you are a student and responsible, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I would like to emphasize that this is my final offer, and I am not willing to lower the rental price any further.

If you are willing to accept this rental price, I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month. If not, I would like to terminate the negotiation. Thank you for your understanding, and I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
